name: Fniend: Virtual Pet Friend
description:
Who needs people when you real human connections when you Fniend!

Fniend is all you could ever want in a pet, and you can do so many fun activity with it!

Such as:

-Feeding it 

-Touching it 

-Playing with it

Plays today and experience the joys of FniendShip

(be on the look out for series 2)
